lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

3. After that, locate the `src/main/java/duke.Duke.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run duke.Duke.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:

implementation group: 'org.openjfx', name: 'javafx-graphics', version: javaFxVersion, classifier: 'linux'
* Represents controller for a dialog box consisting of an ImageView to represent the speaker's face and a label
* Flips the dialog box such that the ImageView is on the left and text on the right.
public static DialogBox getUserDialog(String text, Image img) {
public static DialogBox getDukeDialog(String text, Image img) {
* Represents a Task Management Chat Bot.
* @param filePath The given file path to the data file.
* Returns a response based on the given input.
* @param input The given user input from the GUI.
* @return The String of the response from Chad.
* A GUI for Duke using FXML.
* Controller for MainWindow. Provides the layout for the other controls.
* Creates two dialog boxes, one echoing user input and the other containing Duke's reply and then appends them to
* the dialog container. Clears the user input after processing.
* Represents a Add Command to be executed.
* @param task The given Task to be added to a TaskList.
* Executes the list of commands to add a Task from a TaskList.
* @param taskList The given TaskList with the Task to be added.
* @param ui The given Ui to show the status of the adding command.
* @param storage The given Storage that saves the TaskList locally.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Executes the list of commands associated with the Command object.
* @param taskList The given TaskList required for execution of some commands.
* @param ui The given Ui required for execution of some commands.
* @param storage The given Storage required for execution of some commands.
public abstract void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage);
* Returns a boolean value to indicate if Command object is an exit command.
* @return True if the Command object is an ExitCommand.
* Represents a Delete command to be executed.
* @param index The TaskList index of the Task to be deleted.
* Executes the list of commands to delete a Task from a TaskList.
* @param taskList The given TaskList with the Task to be deleted.
* @param ui The given Ui to show the status of the deletion command.
* @param storage The given Storage that saves the TaskList locally.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Represents an Exit command to be executed.
* Executes the list of commands to exit the chatbot.
* @param taskList The given TaskList associated with the chatbot.
* @param ui The given Ui to show the status of the exit command.
* @param storage The given Storage that saves the TaskList locally.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Represents a Find command to be executed.
* @param queryString The given String to be searched on a TaskList.
* Executes the list of commands to find a Task from a TaskList.
* @param taskList The given TaskList to be searched on.
* @param ui The given Ui to show the status of the finding of the task.
* @param storage The given Storage that saves the TaskList locally.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Represents a Mark command to be executed.
* @param index The TaskList index of the Task to be marked.
* Executes the list of commands to mark a Task from a TaskList.
* @param taskList The given TaskList with the Task to be marked.
* @param ui The given Ui to show the status of the marking of the task.
* @param storage The given Storage that saves the TaskList locally.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Represents a Print List command to be executed.
* Executes the list of commands to print the TaskList.
* @param taskList The given TaskList to be printed.
* @param ui The given Ui to print the TaskList.
* @param storage The given Storage that saves the TaskList locally.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Prints the error message indicating an unknown command has been entered.
* @param taskList The given TaskList associated with the chatbot.
* @param ui The given Ui used to print the error message.
* @param storage The given Storage that saves the TaskList locally.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Represents an unmark command to be executed.

* @param taskList The given TaskList with the Task to be unmarked.
* @param ui The given Ui to show the status of the unmarking of the task.
* @param storage The given Storage that saves the TaskList locally.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) {

public static Command parse(String input) throws TaskException {

Event event = new Event(description, fromDate, toDate);

public static Event parseUserEvent(String input) throws EventException {

public static String parseUserFind(String input) throws TaskException {
* Returns the String of the given TaskList in the data file format.

* Represents a storage for the list of Tasks.
* @param path The given path to the data file.
System.out.println("Error: Unable to create local file");
* Returns an ArrayList of Tasks from local data file.
* @return ArrayList consisting of Task read from the data file.
System.out.println("Error: Unable to load local file");
* Save the given TaskList into a local data file.
* @param taskList The given TaskList to be saved locally.
* Represent a list consisting of Task objects.

* @param list The initial list of Task to be stored in the TaskList.
* Returns a string representation of the TaskList with individual Task.
* @return The string representation of the list of Task in the TaskList.
* Add a given Task into the TaskList.

* Removes a Task of the given index and returns the removed Task.
* If given index is out of bound, returns null.
* @param index The index of Task to be removed.
* @return The Task object that has been removed from the TaskList.
* Update the status of the Task of given index to completed and
* returns the Task. If given index is out of bound, returns null.
* @param index The index of the Task to be marked complete.
* @return The Task object that has been marked complete.
* Update the status of the Task of given index to uncompleted and
* returns the Task. If given index is out of bound, returns null.
* @param index The index of the Task to be marked incomplete.
* @return The Task object that has been marked incomplete.

* @return The number of Task in the TaskList.

* @return TaskList with Task of matching descriptions.
* Represents user interface of the chatbot.
* Prints the entry message of the chatbot.
* Prints the exit message of the chatbot.
this.message = "Bye. Hope to see you again soon!\n";
* Prints the current message in the Ui object and clears the message.
* Adds all the String representation of Tasks in a given TaskList.
* Adds a message to indicate that a given task has been successfully added.
this.message += "Got it. I've added this task:\n";
* Adds a message to indicate that a given task has been successfully deleted.
* Adds a message to indicate that a given task has been successfully marked.
this.message += "Nice! I've marked this task as done:\n";
* Adds a message to indicate that a given task has been successfully unmarked.
this.message += "OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:\n";
* Add the error message from a given Exeception.
* @param e The Exception thrown from the execution of a method.
this.message += "Oops! we encountered an error\n" + e.getMessage() + "\n";
* Adds the error message when the parser cannot find a matching command.
this.message += "Oops! I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means :-(\n";
* Adds the message to indicate the find query is successful.
this.message += "Here are the matching tasks in your list:\n";
* Adds the String representation of the given Task into the message.
* @param task The given Task to be added into the message of the UI.
* Adds the message indicating the size of the TaskList.
this.message += "Now you have " + taskList.size() + " tasks in the list." + "\n";

<ScrollPane fx:id="scrollPane" hbarPolicy="NEVER" hvalue="1.0" prefHeight="557.0" prefWidth="400.0" vvalue="1.0">
